name: Space Broccoli
description:
It's a minimalistic 2bit game with a deep message about saving life in space.

DEFEND THE SPACE BROCCOLI!
Hit enemies with you branches and crash them to the ground to save the trunk.

Controls:
LEFT / RIGHT arrows

Notes:
It's minimalistic because I had no time to make any assets. Really, there is not even one. You can see only physics debug draw. I also had no time to make win / lose condition. Have fun!

Game was made with LibGDX for LibGDX Game Jam in last two days. for lighting I used awesome box2dlights.

SOURCE (quite clean and well commented): https://github.com/lukz/grow

Follow me on twitter! https://twitter.com/lukz_dev
